description: East Los Streetscapers (Wayne Healy and David Botello), assisted by Daniel Fernandez, Ricardo Lopez, Omar Ross, Bert Juarez, Saul Marquez, Rudy Reyes, Peter Moc, and Ronald Rivera. Reflecting the African American and Mexican American composition of the neighborhood, the mural draws upon ancient African and Mexican traditions as well as imagery of contemporary family life. Sponsored and commissioned by SPARC. Photo: © Robin Dunitz
